question: Oliver and David have 93 minutes to walk to the bank together. It takes them 28 minutes to get to the corner where the cinema is. It takes them another 13 minutes to get to the library. How much longer do they have to get to bank without being late?
answer:
Oliver and David arrive at the cinema with 93 - 28 = <<93-28=65>>65 minutes left to reach the library.
They then arrive at the library and have 65 - 13 = <<65-13=52>>52 minutes left to get to bank without being late.
#### 52
